description: Updates the permissions to a data source.

parameters.name: AwsAccountId
parameters.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID.

parameters.name: DataSourceId
parameters.description: The ID of the data source. This ID is unique per Amazon Web Services Region for each Amazon Web Services account.

parameters.name: GrantPermissions
parameters.description: A list of resource permissions that you want to grant on the data source. (dict) --- Permission for the resource. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the principal. This can be one of the following: The ARN of an Amazon QuickSight user or group associated with a data source or dataset. (This is common.) The ARN of an Amazon QuickSight user, group, or namespace associated with an analysis, dashboard, template, or theme. (This is common.) The ARN of an Amazon Web Services account root: This is an IAM ARN rather than a QuickSight ARN. Use this option only to share resources (templates) across Amazon Web Services accounts. (This is less common.) The IAM action to grant or revoke permissions on. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Principal
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the principal. This can be one of the following:

nested_params.name: Actions
nested_params.description: The IAM action to grant or revoke permissions on.

parameters.name: RevokePermissions
parameters.description: A list of resource permissions that you want to revoke on the data source. (dict) --- Permission for the resource. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the principal. This can be one of the following: The ARN of an Amazon QuickSight user or group associated with a data source or dataset. (This is common.) The ARN of an Amazon QuickSight user, group, or namespace associated with an analysis, dashboard, template, or theme. (This is common.) The ARN of an Amazon Web Services account root: This is an IAM ARN rather than a QuickSight ARN. Use this option only to share resources (templates) across Amazon Web Services accounts. (This is less common.) The IAM action to grant or revoke permissions on. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Principal
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the principal. This can be one of the following:

nested_params.name: Actions
nested_params.description: The IAM action to grant or revoke permissions on.

nested_items.name: DataSourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the data source.

nested_items.name: DataSourceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the data source. This ID is unique per Amazon Web Services Region for each Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: RequestId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services request ID for this operation.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The HTTP status of the request.
